description:
This 30 day challenge was created to help men make sacrifices in order to increase their overall quality of life, confidence, mindset and more.

Throughout this course you will learn how you can start achieving your goals and live a better life by sacrificing the things that hold you back.

Towards the end of this course I also briefly cover Entrepreneurship and why you should start thinking outside the box.

Included is a daily tracker to keep yourself accountable throughout the challenge.

The challenge overall is 30 days but going through the course material should not take more than a few days. It includes roughly 1 hour with a video content with my commentary on each topic.

Why should you take this course:

You are unhappy with your current lifestyle, maybe you are overweight and out of shape, you lack energy and motivation. You want to have more confidence in your life and become financially free. This challenge will set you on the right path to success.

Here are some examples of what you will be sacrificing:

  • No TV
  • No Video Games
  • No Porn
  • No Junk Food
  • No Sleeping In

I also encourage daily habits such as:

  • Exercising Daily
  • Reading Personal Development
  • Writing Down Goals
  • Taking Cold Showers
  • Getting organized and keeping your living space clean

Last but not least I also focus on why you should become an Entrepreneur and start thinking outside the box to achieve financial success and freedom in your life.
title: 30 Days of Sacrifice - Challenge for Men
